reasoning_steps: Step 1: Sourced latest available institutional ownership data for AAPL from Nasdaq Institutional Holdings and Yahoo Finance Major Holders, based on most recent 13F filings (primarily Q3 2025).
Step 2: Ranked holders by shares held and selected the top 15 largest institutional and fund holders.
Step 3: Entered values into the Holders sheet only and relied on the Rubric sheet to cross-check ownership and totals without modification.
